# XDC Apothem Testnet Monitoring Dashboard

This dashboard provides real-time monitoring of the Apothem Testnet services and endpoints.

## Monitored Services

**RPC Endpoints**
- https://rpc.apothem.network
- https://apothem.xdcrpc.com
- https://erpc.apothem.network
- http://157.173.195.189:8555 (Custom Testnet RPC)

**eRPC Endpoints**
- https://erpc.apothem.network (Network ID: 51)

**WebSocket**
- wss://ws.apothem.network/ws
- ws://157.173.195.189:8556 (Custom Testnet WebSocket)

**Block Explorers**
- https://apothem.xdcscan.io
- https://apothem.blocksscan.io
- https://explorer.apothem.network

**Faucets**
- https://faucet.apothem.network
- https://faucet.blocksscan.io

panels.description: Latest block height on Apothem Testnet.

targets.query:
from(bucket: "xdc_metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "block_height" and r.chainId == "51")
  |> group(columns: ["chainId"])
  |> max(column: "_value")
  |> yield(name: "max")

panels.title: Current Block Height

panels.description: Time between blocks on Apothem Testnet. Lower values indicate healthy network.

targets.query:
from(bucket: "xdc_metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "block_time" and r.chainId == "51")
  |> last(column: "_value")

panels.title: Block Time

panels.description: Current status of WebSocket endpoints. Green = connected, red = disconnected.

targets.query:
from(bucket: "xdc_metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "websocket_status" and r.chainId == "51")
  |> last(column: "_value")
  |> group(columns: ["endpoint"])

panels.title: WebSocket Status

panels.description: WebSocket connectivity timeline. Green = connected, red = disconnected.

targets.query:
from(bucket: "xdc_metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "websocket_status" and r.chainId == "51")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "endpoint"])
  |> group(columns: ["endpoint"])

panels.title: WS Endpoint Status History

panels.description: Block height comparison across RPC endpoints. Discrepancies indicate sync issues.

targets.query:
from(bucket: "xdc_metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "block_height" and r.chainId == "51")

panels.title: Block Height Comparison

panels.description: Current status of HTTPS RPC endpoints. Green = operational, red = down or error.

targets.query:
from(bucket: "xdc_metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "rpc_status" and r.chainId == "51")
  |> last(column: "_value")
  |> group(columns: ["endpoint"])

panels.title: HTTPS RPC Status

panels.description: RPC endpoint availability timeline. Green = up, red = down. Helps identify recurring issues.

targets.query:
from(bucket: "xdc_metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "transaction_monitor" and r.chainId == "51")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "success" and r.type == "normal_transaction")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.rpc =~ /^https?:\/\// or r.rpc == "http://157.173.195.189:8555")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: if r._value then 1 else 0 }))
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "rpc"])
  |> group(columns: ["rpc"])

panels.title: RPC Endpoint Status History

panels.description: Recent blocks with their total, successful, and failed transaction counts.

targets.query:
from(bucket: "xdc_metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "transactions_per_block" and r.chainId == "51")
  |> keep(columns: ["_value", "block_number", "status"])
  |> group()
  |> pivot(rowKey:["block_number"], columnKey: ["status"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> sort(columns: ["block_number"], desc: true)

panels.title: Recent Transactions Per Block

panels.description: Visual breakdown of transaction success and failure rates by block number.

targets.query:
from(bucket: "xdc_metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "transactions_per_block" and r.status == "success" and r.chainId == "51")
  |> keep(columns: ["_value", "block_number", "status"])
  |> group()
  |> pivot(rowKey:["block_number"], columnKey: ["status"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> sort(columns: ["block_number"], desc: true)

from(bucket: "xdc_metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "transactions_per_block" and r.status == "failed" and r.chainId == "51")
  |> keep(columns: ["_value", "block_number", "status"])
  |> group()
  |> pivot(rowKey:["block_number"], columnKey: ["status"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> sort(columns: ["block_number"], desc: true)

panels.title: Transaction Count by Block Number

panels.description: New blocks created per minute. Normal rate is ~30 blocks/minute.

targets.query:
from(bucket: "xdc_metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "block_height" and r.chainId == "51")
  |> group(columns: ["endpoint"])
  |> derivative(unit: 1m, nonNegative: true)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean)

panels.title: Block Height Growth Rate

panels.description: Successful vs failed transactions per 5-minute window.

targets.query:
from(bucket: "xdc_metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "transactions_per_block" and r.status == "success" and r.chainId == "51")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 5m, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "xdc_metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "transactions_per_block" and r.status == "failed" and r.chainId == "51")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)

panels.title: Transaction Volume (5-minute windows)

panels.description: Historical trend of block times. Shows network performance over time.

targets.query:
from(bucket: "xdc_metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "block_time" and r.chainId == "51")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "value")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value"])

panels.title: Block Time Trend

panels.description: 95th percentile of RPC response times. Shows near worst-case performance for each endpoint.

targets.query:
from(bucket: "xdc_metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "rpc_latency" and r.chainId == "51")
  |> group(columns: ["endpoint"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: (column, tables=<-) => tables |> quantile(q: 0.95, column: column), createEmpty: false)

panels.title: RPC Response Times (95th Percentile)

panels.description: Success/failure history of XDC native token transfer transactions (normal transactions only) across different RPC endpoints

  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: if r._value then 1 else 0 }))
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "rpc"])

panels.title: Explorer Status

panels.description: Current epoch information for the XDC Apothem Testnet

targets.query:
from(bucket: "xdc_metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "validator_summary" and r.chainId == "51")
  |> last()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _time: r._time, _value: int(v: r.epoch), _field: "Epoch" }))

panels.title: Current Epoch

panels.description: Start Round of epoch information for the XDC Apothem Testnet

targets.query:
// First find the latest epoch
latestEpoch = from(bucket: "xdc_metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "validator_summary" and r.chainId == "51")
  |> keep(columns: ["epoch"])
  |> sort(columns: ["epoch"], desc: true)
  |> limit(n: 1)
  |> findRecord(fn: (key) => true, idx: 0)

// Then get the round data for only that epoch
from(bucket: "xdc_metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "validator_summary" and r.chainId == "51")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.epoch == latestEpoch.epoch)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "round")
  |> last()

panels.title: Start Round Of Epoch

panels.description: Start Block of epoch information for the XDC Apothem Testnet

targets.query:
// First find the latest epoch
latestEpoch = from(bucket: "xdc_metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "validator_summary" and r.chainId == "51")
  |> keep(columns: ["epoch"])
  |> sort(columns: ["epoch"], desc: true)
  |> limit(n: 1)
  |> findRecord(fn: (key) => true, idx: 0)

// Then get the block number data for only that epoch
from(bucket: "xdc_metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "validator_summary" and r.chainId == "51")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.epoch == latestEpoch.epoch)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "block_number")
  |> last()

panels.title: Start Block Of Epoch

panels.description: Distribution of validator nodes across different statuses

targets.query:
from(bucket: "xdc_metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "validator_summary" and r.chainId == "51")
  |> last()
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ 
    _time: r._time,
    "Masternodes": r.masternode_count,
    "Standby Nodes": r.standbynode_count,
    "Penalty Nodes": r.penalty_count
  }))
  |> yield(name: "node_distribution")

panels.title: Validator Node Distribution

panels.description: Number of penalty nodes over time

targets.query:
from(bucket: "xdc_metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "validator_summary" and r.chainId == "51" and r._field == "penalty_count")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 5m, fn: last, createEmpty: false)

panels.title: Penalty List Size Over Time

panels.description: Shows validator performance metrics for the top 20 nodes with the most missed blocks.

targets.query:
from(bucket: "xdc_metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "consensus_miner_performance" and r.chainId == "51")
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => exists r.missed_blocks and exists r.total_blocks_mined)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
      miner: r.miner,
      total_blocks_mined: float(v: r.total_blocks_mined),
      missed_blocks: float(v: r.missed_blocks),
      total_attempts: float(v: r.total_attempts),
      success_rate: float(v: r.success_rate) / 100.0,
      last_block: float(v: r.last_block)
    }))
  |> group()
  |> sort(columns: ["missed_blocks"], desc: true)
  |> limit(n: 20)

panels.title: Miner Performance (Top 20 by Missed Blocks)

panels.description: Timeout periods detected on the network

targets.query:
from(bucket: "xdc_metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "consensus_timeout_periods" and r.chainId == "51")
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
      _time: r._time,
      timeout_period: r.timeout_period,
      expected_timeout: r.expected_timeout,
      missed_miners: r.missed_miners,
      variance: r.variance
    }))
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "timeout_period", "expected_timeout", "missed_miners", "variance"])
